name: Jutsu Ninja Game
description:
This game is the prototype of an idea that I have and I would love to acquire resources to work on it, I invite you to try it and give me your opinion. A great game of jutsu without internet.

Adapt your own style of jutsus and ninja powers to defeat your opponents. Either with Ninjutsu or Genjutsu, how much ninja hands strategy can you create? Show your intelligence as a shinobi.

The best anime jutsus game without internet with superhuman abilities, to launch powers and jutsu hands ninja.

You will not stop thinking and generating combat strategies that allow you to surprise any shinobi, as well as you will not stop throwing shuriken and kunai. NINJA Weapons.

Advance in the world of ninjutsu, tai-jutsu and gen-jutsu, gain experience, obtain powers and improve your JUTSUS even more, so that they become powerful from genin to sannin.

Become the shinobi God and rule the ninja world, THERE ARE NO ADVERSARIES FOR YOU, BECOME THE BEST !.

Throughout the game you will face experienced villains and deadly and powerful ninjutsu, genjutsu and taijutsu masters who control the world and want only death and mayhem.

Return order, not only in your clan and village but the entire world, may your ninja honor go ahead.

You will be rewarded with:

- Experience.

- New POWERFUL Jutsus and Fighting Skills.

- Improvements in your superhuman techniques.

- Amazing Powers and Extraordinary Battle Summons. without Internet

- Legendary techniques.

- Anime games ninja uniforms.

- Armaments, shuriken and kunais.

- TOO MUCH FUN! ninja game WITHOUT INTERNET.

the game of jutsus without internet OFF-LINE, is the most GREAT of ALL. Become a SHINOBI with ELITE jutsus get HONOR and GLORY with the speed of your JUTSUS.
